scripts.rubyStyle: docker compose run --rm web rubocop --require rubocop-airbnb
scripts.web:assetServer: docker compose run --rm web bundle exec vite dev
scripts.web:compileAssets: docker compose run -e "RAILS_ENV=production" -e "NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider" --rm web bundle exec vite build --clear
scripts.web:clobberAssets: docker compose run -e "RAILS_ENV=production" -e "NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider" --rm web bundle exec vite clobber
scripts.web:dbCreate: docker compose run --rm web rake db:create
scripts.web:dbMigrate: docker compose run --rm web rake db:migrate
scripts.web:credentials: docker compose run --rm web bash -c "EDITOR=nano rails credentials:edit"
scripts.test:compileAssets: docker compose run -e "RAILS_ENV=test" -e "NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider" --rm web bundle exec vite build --clear --mode test
scripts.test:jest: docker compose run -e "RAILS_ENV=test" -e "NODE_ENV=test" --rm web yarn jest
scripts.test:rspec: docker compose run -e "RAILS_ENV=test" -e "NODE_ENV=test" -e "NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider" --rm web bundle exec rspec
scripts.docker:prune: docker system prune -a && docker volume prune -a
